sentences.en: “His novel trots out an Irish president named Finn”(&b{Charles E. Claffey})
sentences.cn: “他的小说展示了一个名叫芬的爱尔兰总统”(&b{查尔斯E.克拉弗})

sentences.en: Alan took the reins and the small horse started trotting.
sentences.cn: 艾伦抓住缰绳，小马开始慢跑起来。

sentences.en: As they started up again, the horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 当他们又重新骑上马时，马突然轻快地小跑起来。

sentences.en: Down the quiet street Archer heard the approaching trot of her horses.
sentences.cn: 阿切尔已听见她的马蹄声在下面那条安静的街道上离得很近了.

sentences.en: everyone trots out the old excuse.
sentences.cn: 人人都拿出那个老借口来做挡箭牌。

sentences.en: He had broken into a trot.
sentences.cn: 他突然小跑起来.

sentences.en: He heard a horse approaching at a spanking trot.
sentences.cn: 他听到一匹马正在疾步驰近.

sentences.en: Her new job certainly keeps her on the trot.
sentences.cn: 她的新工作把她忙得不可开交.

sentences.en: I've been on the trot all day.
sentences.cn: 我整天都在不停地忙碌。

sentences.en: Little Trot, a tiny spaniel was comfortably curled up on her back.
sentences.cn: 那只哈叭狗小特洛特这时候正舒舒服服地蜷曲着身子伏在它背上.

sentences.en: Our horses slowed to a trot.
sentences.cn: 我们的马减速慢跑。

sentences.en: Potter started on a trot that quickly increased to a run.
sentences.cn: 波特开始还是小跑,很快就大跑起来.

sentences.en: She broke into a trot (= started running slowly ) and hurried on ahead of us.
sentences.cn: 她突然小跑起来，赶到我们前头。

sentences.en: She came trotting down the steps from the library.
sentences.cn: 她从图书馆出来，小跑着下台阶。

sentences.en: She lost five games on the trot.
sentences.cn: 她接连输了5场比赛。

sentences.en: She would happily trot behind him as he set off to commune with nature.
sentences.cn: 他出去亲近大自然的时候，她就会一路小跑，快活地跟在他后面。

sentences.en: The horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 马突然快步小跑起来。

sentences.en: The natural paces of the horse include the walk, the trot and the gallop.
sentences.cn: 马的自然溜蹄包括走步 、 小跑和飞奔.

sentences.en: The waltz and fox trot were the dances she knew.
sentences.cn: 华尔兹和狐步舞是她跳得最好的舞步.

sentences.en: they lost seven matches on the trot.
sentences.cn: 他们连输七局。

sentences.en: They passed me at a trot.
sentences.cn: 他们从我身边快步走过.

sentences.en: Was it really necessary to trot out the same old stereotypes about Ireland?
sentences.cn: 真的有必要反复提关于爱尔兰的那套老看法吗？

sentences.en: We rode at a spanking trot.
sentences.cn: 我们骑着马疾驰而去。

trans.tran_en: the movement of a horse at trotting speed
if a horse trots, it moves fairly quickly with each front leg moving at the same time as the opposite back leg
